column1: Narrator : The island is quite vast, you don’t see the end of it. Yet, it seems totally empty.
Narrator : On the beach : « A boire et à manger » is written on a wooden plannel

column2: Choice : Show me what you sell (trade)
column8: Choice : All is good for you ?(quete)

column3: OtherSpeak : Only pirates from the DIRECTIONTOFORMULA are interrested
column4: OtherSpeak : I haven’t heard about it
column8: OtherSpeak : You know what they say
OtherSpeak : The bigger the laugh, the bigger the belly
